system.description:
Crafting Components: Vial of corresponding planar essence, ring of spell storing with dominate monster stored within it

This ring is attuned to one of the four Elemental Planes, as determined by the Narrator. While wearing this ring, you have advantage on attack rolls against elementals from the linked plane, and they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can also expend 2 of the ringâ€™s charges to cast dominate monster on an elemental native to the linked plane. The ring imparts additional benefits based on the linked plane.

The ring has 5 charges and regains 1d4+1 charges at dawn. Spells cast from the ring have a save DC of 17.

[[/r 1d4]]

  1. Ring of Air Elemental Command

  2. Ring of Earth Elemental Command

  3. Ring of Fire Elemental Command

  4. Ring of Water Elemental Command
